Summary: Saucer Shape in the sky Gray to Silver in color extremely fast.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Sun City West
There were no other sightings in Sun City West on or around December 3rd 2012
divs: sighting detailsi was at our gym with my neighbor and we finished about 8:40pm on 12\3\12. we were going home about 1\4 to 1\2 mile away from our gym when about 8:45pm i saw this saucer shaped craft gray to silver in the sky and said to my neighbor what in the hell is that ,and that quick it was gone before he got to see the craft.since then i keep seeing a picture of the craft in my mind.
